title: 2017 Spirit Awards: Watch All the Winners' Acceptance Speeches | Hollywood Reporter
text: Sign up for our Newsletters . Daily Edition Spirit Awards: Watch All the Winners' Acceptance Speeches 4:37 PM 2/25/2017 by Annie Howard 'Moonlight' was the big winner at the 2017 ceremony. Watch a complete roundup of acceptance speeches from winners including Barry Jenkins, Casey Affleck and Isabelle Huppert. Barry Jenkins Kevork Djansezian/Getty Images for Film Independent 'Moonlight'
